requirements.summary: Build a frontend interface where users can input their current WiFi settings and view personalized optimization tips to increase download speeds
acceptanceCriteria: Users can enter WiFi connection details through a form
Interface shows before/after expected speed improvements

file_operations.description: Create a form component using shadcn/ui components (Input, Label, Button, Card) to collect WiFi connection details including SSID, signal strength, frequency, channel, and interference level. The form calls backend's analyzeWiFi method with the WiFiConfig data structure defined in backend.d.ts. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a component to display OptimizationRecommendation results from the backend. Show recommendedChannel, recommendedFrequency, and signalImprovement values using shadcn/ui Card and Badge components. Include before/after speed improvement visualization. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create the main optimization page that integrates WiFiConfigForm and OptimizationResults components. Manage state for WiFi configuration input and optimization recommendations. Wire generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/wifi-signal.dim_128x128.png as a static asset icon in the page header.
Wire OptimizePage into the application routing structure. Add a navigation link to the optimization feature in the main app navigation.

requirements.summary: Implement a speed testing feature that measures current download speed and tracks improvements over time
acceptanceCriteria: Users can initiate a download speed test
Test results are displayed in Mbps
Historical speed data is stored and viewable as a trend chart

file_operations.description: Create a component with a button to initiate a simulated speed test. Implement client-side speed test logic using a fetch request to measure download speed. Display current test result in Mbps. After test completion, call backend's recordSpeedTest method with SpeedTestResult data. Use shadcn/ui Button and Card components. Wire generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/speed-gauge.dim_256x256.png as a visual indicator during and after the test. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a trend chart component that fetches historical speed data using backend's getSpeedTestTrend method. Display SpeedTestResult array as a line chart showing downloadSpeed over timestamp. Use a charting solution compatible with React (e.g., recharts if available, or a simple SVG-based chart). Use shadcn/ui Card for the chart container. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a page that integrates SpeedTestRunner and SpeedTrendChart components. Manage state for current test results and historical data. Provide a unified interface for running tests and viewing trends.
Wire SpeedTestPage into the application routing structure. Add a navigation link to the speed test feature in the main app navigation.

requirements.summary: Design a creative, modern visual theme for the app with a cohesive color scheme, typography, and layout that conveys speed and network connectivity. Use energetic colors (avoiding blue and purple unless specifically requested) and ensure consistent styling across all components
acceptanceCriteria: App has a distinct visual identity with consistent colors and fonts
Design elements reinforce the theme of speed and optimization
UI is visually cohesive across all pages and components

file_operations.description: Update global CSS variables and Tailwind theme to use energetic colors that convey speed and connectivity (e.g., vibrant greens, oranges, or yellows). Avoid blue and purple. Define consistent font families that suggest modernity and speed. Apply cohesive spacing and border radius values.

Extend Tailwind configuration with custom color palette reflecting speed and network themes (energetic, non-blue/purple colors). Configure custom font families and design tokens for consistent spacing, shadows, and transitions that reinforce the speed optimization theme.

Create a layout component that wraps all pages with consistent header, navigation, and footer. Apply the custom theme styling globally. Include branding elements and navigation links to OptimizePage and SpeedTestPage. Use shadcn/ui components for navigation structure. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wrap all routes with the Layout component to ensure consistent visual theme and navigation across the entire application.
